title: 玩家进入末地时客户端崩溃
author: piao_xue
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2020-4-15 17:26 编辑 

只有我一个人能进去不崩
其他人如果通过末地传送门进入，客户端就会崩溃，而且因为卡在了传送门方块上导致拆除传送门前再也不能进入服务器,渲染还会出错
服务端提示报错如下
>[08:37:29 WARN]: Failed to handle packet for /110.186.239.82:54988
 net.minecraft.util.ReportedException: Colliding entity with block
        at net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayerMP.func_71127_g(EntityPlayerMP.java:563) ~[oq.class:?]

        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:923) [MinecraftServer.class:?]

        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:619) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) [?:1.8.0_242]
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
        at net.minecraft.server.management.PlayerList.transferEntityToWorld(PlayerList.java:1217) ~[pl.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.management.PlayerList.transferEntityToWorld(PlayerList.java:1192) ~[pl.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.management.PlayerList.transferPlayerToDimension(PlayerList.java:1156) ~[pl.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.management.PlayerList.changeDimension(PlayerList.java:1073) ~[pl.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayerMP.changeDimension(EntityPlayerMP.java:876) ~[oq.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.entity.Entity.func_184204_a(Entity.java:2854) ~[vg.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.block.BlockEndPortal.func_180634_a(BlockEndPortal.java:75) ~[aqh.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.entity.Entity.func_145775_I(Entity.java:1189) ~[vg.class:?]

        at net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer.func_70636_d(EntityPlayer.java:534) ~[aed.class:?]

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2020-4-15 17:02 编辑 

如果末地世界没有玩家建筑的话  尝试删除末地世界的区块文件使其重新生成

世界目录在world\DIM1\region下

replies.author: xbwfwq
replies.txt_content: 删除末地出生点附近实体和方块
